AGENT_BOTS.SIDEBAR_TXT:
Agent Bots

Agent Bots are like the most fabulous members of your team. They can handle the small stuff, so you can focus on the stuff that matters. Give them a try.

You can manage your bots from this page or create new ones using the 'Add bot configuraton' button.

Open the Agent bots handbook in another tab for a helping hand.

BOT_CONFIG.ERROR: Vul uw CSML bot configuratie hierboven in.
BOT_CONFIG.API_ERROR: Your CSML configuration is invalid. Please fix it and try again.

BOT_CONFIGURATION.TITLE: Selecteer een agent bot
BOT_CONFIGURATION.DESC: Assign an Agent Bot to your inbox. They can handle initial conversations and transfer them to a live agent when necessary.
BOT_CONFIGURATION.SUCCESS_MESSAGE: De agent bot is succesvol bijgewerkt.
BOT_CONFIGURATION.DISCONNECTED_SUCCESS_MESSAGE: Succesvol de agent bot verbinding verbroken.
BOT_CONFIGURATION.ERROR_MESSAGE: Could not update the agent bot. Please try again.
BOT_CONFIGURATION.DISCONNECTED_ERROR_MESSAGE: Could not disconnect the agent bot. Please try again.

API.ERROR_MESSAGE: Could not add bot. Please try again later.

LIST.404: No bots found. You can create a bot by clicking the 'Configure new bot' button â†—

DELETE.TITLE: Delete bot
DELETE.DESCRIPTION: Weet u zeker dat u deze bot wilt verwijderen? Deze actie kan niet ongedaan worden gemaakt.

Could not update bot. Please try again.
